properties.description: Prestigious three-bedroom detached family home situated in the heart of Cinnamon Gardens (Colombo 07). Within walking distance to Viharamahadevi Park, Odel, and leading international schools. The property features spacious living areas, a modern teak pantry, full air conditioning, and a landscaped garden. Includes maid's quarters and secure parking for two vehicles.

Presented in excellent decorative order, this two-bedroom luxury apartment offers stunning sea views off Marine Drive. The modern open-plan kitchen comes equipped with built-in appliances. Residents enjoy access to a rooftop infinity pool and 24-hour security. Ideally located near the Wellawatte beach and railway station.

Stunning five-bedroom colonial-style mansion in Mount Lavinia with a sprawling garden. This property features high ceilings, a grand living hall, and a master suite with a walk-in closet and Jacuzzi. Perfect for a large family, located just minutes from the famous Mount Lavinia Hotel and private beach access.

A cozy one-bedroom apartment perfect for professionals, located in the rapidly developing Rajagiriya area. Features include a bright living room with balcony access, a compact modern kitchenette, and air conditioning. Close to the Parliament walking tracks and supermarkets.

Spacious four-bedroom architectural house in the hill capital, Kandy. This property boasts scenic mountain views, large windows for natural light, and a newly renovated kitchen diner. The garden is filled with fruit trees and provides a cool, peaceful retreat just 10 minutes from the Temple of the Tooth.

Luxury three-bedroom penthouse apartment at One Galle Face with panoramic views of the Port City and Indian Ocean. Includes private elevator access, concierge service, and designated parking. The interior is finished with imported marble flooring and smart home automation.

Charming two-bedroom villa situated inside the historic Galle Fort. This delightful home features a traditional central courtyard, coral walls, and antique timber door frames. A perfect holiday home or investment property surrounded by cafes and boutique shops.
